ID: CDTB1RC_00
From: Lynn AlKhatib <Lynn.AlKhatib@chalhoub.com>
To: Ramzi Modad <Ramzi.Modad@chalhoub.com>; Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Geoffroy Bunetel <Geoffroy.Bunetel@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-05 13:06
Subject: FW: Stakeholder Engagement Plan Meeting - 7th April - Minutes & Actions 
--------------------------------------------------
Hello everyone,
I hope you are well. Some of you have been involved in our stakeholder engagement process and thank you for the support so far. We have identified one Category for our stakeholder mapping under Risk and Crisis, led by Geoffroy. The main top Group-wide stakeholders are Dubai Police and Nasco Insurance. 
As you can see, Geoffroy proposed your names as owners or shadow owners for each stakeholder. Please fill the below with the right names, title and email of the mentioned contacts. Feel free to edit or update.

@Ramzi Modad <mailto:Ramzi.Modad@chalhoub.com>  Would the name of the procurer be also relevant instead of having 3 Police contacts?

Hello everyone,
I hope you are well. Some of you have been involved in our stakeholder engagement process and thank you for the support so far. We have identified one Category for our stakeholder mapping under Risk and Crisis, led by Geoffroy. The main top Group-wide stakeholders are Dubai Police and Nasco Insurance. 
As you can see, Geoffroy proposed your names as owners or shadow owners for each stakeholder. Please fill the below with the right names, title and email of the mentioned contacts. Feel free to edit or update.

@Ramzi Modad <mailto:Ramzi.Modad@chalhoub.com>  Would the name of the procurer be also relevant instead of having 3 Police contacts? 

The next thing following the update of the below, please provide us with your engagement with the below contacts this year, did you meet them? What was planned or discussed? Any achievement worth sharing with the SteerCo? And what is the engagement plan for the rest of the year?

Subject: Stakeholder Engagement Plan Meeting - 7th April - Minutes & Actions

 

Hello all,

 

Please find attached the minutes from the Stakeholder Engagement Plan meeting that took place on 7th April.
